pr_title: cleanup various warnings and TODOs in CustomRequestLog

timeline.message:
cleanup various warnings and TODOs in CustomRequestLog

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

timeline.bodyText:
this is breaking backward compat.
Not sure someone use this but as it's public and it's 9.4.x maybe better to keep the previous constructor and mark it deprecated.
Then remove it in 10.
timeline.author: olamy

replies.bodyText: The constructors are public but Token is a private class, it is really intended to just be part of the internal implementation.
replies.author: lachlan-roberts

replies.bodyText:
haha the paradox of this public constructor and private class.
Sorry for the comment I should have checked the full class
replies.author: olamy

replies.bodyText: Ok cool, do you think I should make the methods and fields on Token private or package protected, if that's better style.
replies.author: lachlan-roberts

replies.bodyText:
no I don't think so.
It's just the diff here didn't show the full class and I have been lazy to look by myself :)
It's just a curiosity of the language 😄
replies.author: olamy
